title: The New baby
brief_description: The daily care of a new baby; breast and bottle feeding; causes of crying between feeds; sleep and coverings; vitamins and orange juice; bathing and suitable types of clothes; the importance of care and affection at all times and of helping the other children in the family adjust to the new arrival.
